thread.title: Rent Controls, a Bane of Landlords, Are Gaining Support as Costs Soar

author: Laura Kusisto
title: Rent Controls, a Bane of Landlords, Are Gaining Support as Costs Soar
text:
Calls for rent-control legislation are growing across the U.S. as apartment tenants endure sharply rising rents and memories fade of the downsides of price caps.
Lawmakers and advocates in California, Illinois and Washington state are pushing to repeal state laws that forbid rent control or place limits on citiesâ€™ ability to regulate rent increases.
A...
